overview:
Kevin brings over 15 years of marketing and product management experience to Drobo.

Previously, Kevin served as VP Marketing at CloudShare and Scalent, and founded and ran the field marketing team at VMware, Inc. in support of the company’s sales growth from $20M to more than $500M annually. Prior to VMware, Kevin led Product Management for Inktomi, and held various leadership roles at RealNetworks and Netscape, as well as a founding role in CDnow. Kevin earned his Bachelor of Science degree in Physics from Brown University and an MBA from Stanford University, and is the author of Marketing Made Easy, a popular trade book from Entrepreneur Magazine Press / McGraw Hill.
